instructions.en: Exit the traffic circle onto Way Name
instructions.es: Sal la rotonda en Way Name
instructions.es-ES: Toma la salida por Way Name
instructions.fr: Sortir du rond-point sur Way Name
instructions.id: Lakukan putar balik ke arah Way Name
instructions.it: Fai una inversione a U in Way Name
instructions.ru: Сверните с круговой развязки на Way Name
instructions.sv: Kör ut ur rondellen in på Way Name
instructions.tr: Way Name üzerinde U dönüşü yöne dön
instructions.vi: Ra bùng binh vào Way Name
